医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
数字平台在塑造人类好奇心方面的作用在某一时刻，您可能已经上网寻找特定的信息，并发现自己“掉进了维基兔子洞”，因为您发现了全新的、更令人着迷的相关主题——一些琐碎，一些相关——；你可能已经陷入困境，很难拼凑出是什么让你陷入困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/The-role-of-digital-platforms-in-shaping- human-curiosity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/The-role-of-digital-platforms-in-shaping- human-curiosity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6246cf7-dec7-43fa-8318-1c8847c5bb16 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 23:58:14 -0400 The role of digital platforms in shaping human curiosity
研究揭示了 COVID-19 期间恶意机器人对公共卫生通信的影响冠状病毒大流行期间，芬兰的信息环境在很多方面都非常特殊和激烈。虚假信息的传播和参与人员的数量达到了前所未有的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-malicious-bots-on-public-health-communication-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Study-reveals-the-impact-of-malicious-bots-on-public-health-communication-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4067231-b204-4b4f-a6e2-22e623588013 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 20:26:00 -0400 Study reveals the impact of malicious bots on public health communication during COVID-19
预测慢加急性肝衰竭患者结局的新预后模型早期确定慢加急性肝衰竭（ACLF）患者的预后对于优化治疗方案和肝脏分配至关重要。本研究旨在确定与 ACLF 相关的危险因素，并开发能够准确预测患者预后的新预后模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/New-prognostic-model-for-predicting-outcomes-in-病人-with-acute-on-chronic-liver-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/New-prognostic-model-for-predicting-outcomes-in-病人-with-acute-on-chronic-liver-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bbb84a1-26d1-46f4-952d-ee​​445f67e61d Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:58:54 -0400 New prognostic model for predicting outcomes in patients with acute-on-chronic liver failure
研究旨在构建肝细胞癌中的circRNA-miRNA-mRNA网络肝细胞癌（HCC）是最致命的恶性肿瘤之一。表观遗传机制揭示非编码 RNA，例如 microRNA (miRNA) 和环状 RNA (circRNA)，参与 HCC 进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Study-aims-to-construct-a-circRNA-miRNA-mRNA-network-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Study-aims-to-construct-a-circRNA-miRNA-mRNA-network-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2f1dc2c-8232-42f3-945a-97813925aa40 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:55:54 -0400 Study aims to construct a circRNA-miRNA-mRNA network in hepatocellular carcinoma
临床试验强调酰亚胺酶对肾移植受者的功效对于经历抗体介导的排斥反应的肾移植受者，当前的护理标准包括通过血浆置换术 (PLEX) 去除供体特异性抗体 (DSA)，这是一种从血液血浆部分去除抗体的程序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Clinical-trial-highlights-efficacy-of-imlifidase-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Clinical-trial-highlights-efficacy-of-imlifidase-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18153b7b-457c-4223-835e-657d176eb84a Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:52:04 -0400 Clinical trial highlights efficacy of imlifidase for kidney transplant recipients
3 期试验评估 clazakizumab 对 caAMR 肾移植受者的作用慢性活性抗体介导的排斥反应（caAMR）是移植后同种异体移植物丢失的常见原因，目前尚无批准的治疗方法。 Clazakizumab 是一种针对炎症细胞因子白细胞介素 6 (IL-6) 的单克隆抗体，在一项 2 期试验中稳定了肾移植受者的肾功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Phase-3-tri-asseses-clazakizumab-in-kidney-transplant-recipients-with-caAMR.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Phase-3-tri-asseses-clazakizumab-in-kidney-transplant-recipients-with-caAMR.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fa29e79-88b6-456e-ada5-bcea2ec9516b Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:42:24 -0400 Phase 3 trial assesses clazakizumab in kidney transplant recipients with caAMR
新型基因疗法 PS-002 针对 IgA 肾病的足细胞IgA 肾病是一种自身免疫性肾脏疾病，补体是先天免疫系统的组成部分，在该病的发病机制中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Novel-gene-therapy-PS-002-targets-足细胞-in-IgA-nephropathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Novel-gene-therapy-PS-002-targets-足细胞-in-IgA-nephropathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66a8dbd0-3e0a-4c30-a558-34af80e90aa4 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:10:56 -0400 Novel gene therapy PS-002 targets podocytes in IgA nephropathy
碳酸酐酶IX在诊断胸膜间皮瘤中的临床应用间皮瘤是一种侵袭性肿瘤，预后较差。使用有限的组织样本对间皮瘤进行组织学诊断可能具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Clinical-utility-of-carbonic-anHydrase-IX-in-diagnosing-pleural-mesothelioma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Clinical-utility-of-carbonic-anHydrase-IX-in-diagnosing-pleural-mesothelioma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18dbdb67-b2e8-4271-a48f-1afed248b0fd Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:07:41 -0400 Clinical utility of carbonic anhydrase IX in diagnosing pleural mesothelioma
来自普通小球藻的生物活性肽用于治疗应用小球藻是绿藻门中的一种绿色光合微藻。我们研究的目标是对光系统 I P700 叶绿素 a 脱辅基蛋白 A2（其光合作用相关蛋白之一）进行生物信息学分析，并寻找有效的生物活性肽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Bioactive-peptides-from-Chlorella-vulgaris-for-therapeutic-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/Bioactive-peptides-from-Chlorella-vulgaris-for-therapeutic-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b42ab1-7a28-4286-a0d5-117af450e269 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 19:02:00 -0400 Bioactive peptides from Chlorella vulgaris for therapeutic applications
TLR10 rs10004195基因型对幽门螺杆菌感染易感性的影响幽门螺杆菌（H. pylori）感染可引起多种继发性消化系统疾病。一些研究发现，Toll样受体（TLR）基因的多态性，包括TLR10 rs10004195，可能与幽门螺杆菌感染的易感性增加有关。尽管报告相互矛盾，我们还是进行了荟萃分析，以阐明这些因素之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Impact-of-TLR10-rs10004195-genotype-on-susceptibility-to-H-pylori-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241026/Impact-of-TLR10-rs10004195-genotype-on-susceptibility-to-H-pylori-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77fd1aba-4058-4f8a-b345-ffc2722e4d80 Sat, 26 Oct 2024 23:31:39 -0400 Impact of TLR10 rs10004195 genotype on susceptibility to H. pylori infection
